dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 3827 IH: To prohibit the United States from providing financial assistance to Benin until Mr. Mojaidou Soumanou is released from prison.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit the United States from providing financial assistance to Benin until Mr. Mojaidou Soumanou is released from prison.

section.header: Prohibition on Foreign Assistance to Benin
section.text: The United States may not obligate or expend any direct financial assistance to the Government of the Republic of Benin unlessâ€”

paragraph.text: Mr. Mojaidou Soumanou is released from prison; or
the U.S. Secretary of State determines that such assistance is needed as emergency disaster relief.
